testcase.name: it should return an error text when invalid details are inputed
it should toast an error message when invalid details are inputed
It should not register a user if firstname is less than two
It should not register a user if lastname is less than two
It should not register a user if email is invalid
It should not register a user if password length is less than 6
It should not register a user if username length is less than 3
It should register a user if all credentials are valid
It should not register a new user if username already exist
It should not register a new user if email already exist
it should login a user with valid credentials
logged in user should be a able to borrow a book
basic user should not be a able to borrow unreturned book
